title: thebloodmaster
author: thebloodmaster
created_time: September 16, 2022, 04:20:50 PMLast edit: September 20, 2022, 12:44:56 PM by thebloodmaster
content: What happened::   Hello i have a problem/dispute with BTC365 so far the site has been good but now i encountered a problem with a betthe bet i speak of is a tennis davis cup game   Kasidit Samrej vs Federico Zeballos the game had a problem with wrong score and cuz of that wrong shown was that zeblasos won first set 6-3 but in fact he lost it the odds were 1.43 for zebalos after first set cuz the system thought he won first set what he didnt he had 4+ odds pre game so normally he should have like 7-8+ odds when he lost first set i attached some screenshots to make it more clear. i thought all good they refund it then i saw this in their announcement channel [Tennis][Davis Cup] 'Samrej, Kasidit (THA)-vs-Zeballos, Federico (BOL)' - 16/09. *LIVE. Due to wrong market offered, selected affected ticket is considered REFUNDED. Kindly re-check your ticket and balance again. Sorry for the inconveniences caused!. i thought ok nice then i looked at my bet  slip and what i see its still lost i contacted the live support they said they have to contact their vendor. the respons was This is Ashley, BTC365 Customer Care, we are here to inform you in regards of your ticket with id : 2209160059371475 , as per vendor the announcement of the refund ticket only affected live betting , since you bet on full time your ticket were not affected and can't be refunded, your ticket resulted in lose as per official result you bet on away team and the winner of the match is the home team (with score 2-0). We hope for your understanding. is the message i received i told them i placed a live bet after the faulty first set now i wait for an answer.EDIT1  account now locked for 30 "investigation" after requested kyc what i sent ofcEDIT2 so i guys i somehow got my bet now refunded idk why now tho but it is refunded my withdrawal function is still blocked tho so the full problem is not solvehttps://gyazo.com/7bc2014f1997c9481c3a7c3504d5e006https://gyazo.com/6ba3d2e9fc8b758d29fd97ed7a48b69aatleast 1 point is now fixedScammers Profile Link:   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3369866Reference Link: Amount Scammed:  300$Payment Method:  tether trc20Proof of Payment:  not needed sportsbookPM/Chat Logs: Additional Notes:   https://gyazo.com/1c05578f1bff3d7d7880b738bf581322gyazo linkshttps://gyazo.com/6131991847aede2acd9e04fae84c93c4https://gyazo.com/9e52f0a29aa6238e04bf685374afcab5https://gyazo.com/4a75d3cbd6b6ae2c2e045c22bb55d1f7https://gyazo.com/44d80408ab1fbe7223138c213da771ca

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: This might not be a good forum to bring up this complaint as I don't think they have a big presence around here.It seems shady they're only giving refunds if you won the bet though, they should be giving you the winnings rather than a refund (which might be reason to ask further too).I don't know why they'd refuse to pay out during the match if you placed a bet, if you could see their scoring was wrong and placed a bet, why couldn't they and why shouldn't they have fixed it before letting people buy tickets? It sounds like they're not very sharp at collecting match information - probably a good reason not to use them again.

It's already proved on that thread that they have some nefarious activities which were already painted on their trust page. You may want to check this thread (SOLVED) BTC365.com SCAM me 20Mbtc.If OP submits some other information, I believe he could get some support from the community.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on September 17, 2022, 12:58:15 AMQuote from: AnotherAlt on September 17, 2022, 12:16:50 AMIf OP submits some other information, I believe he could get some support from the community.what other informations could be helpful?The pm idea above is a better place to start with than the trust system and might get you through to someone high/close to the team if it's actively managed. Generally anything that could help convince people of your case without exposing too much of your own information. Examples may include Screenshots of the bet placed (with the amount or ID number on the bet if you want to keep the bet amount private), Screenshots of your conversations over email (particularly relevant stuff).Obscure anything that might be too confidential.Check the other thread mentioned above to find btc365partners profile, clock on the link that says "trust" and open a flag with them so others can support it if they agree with it.You can also read up on trust flags here which might be helpful in working out how to create one others will support: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5153344.0

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.created_time: September 17, 2022, 06:17:39 PMLast edit: September 17, 2022, 06:29:31 PM by Pmalek
comments.body: That's a very serious mistake by whatever operator was responsible to follow the score of that match. Mistakes with points are common in tennis, but I have never seen a set being awarded to the wrong player like that. That's not just one point that was wrongly assigned, it's a whole bunch of points, games, and the set to top it off. If a score is in doubt, the markets have to be disabled until it's fixed and confirmed with official sources. There shouldn't be possibilities to make bets during those periods. Even though you made a mistake and you bet on a player that ended up losing the match, those wagers can't be considered valid. And looking at the pre-match odds, Samrej was the favorite to win this match. After winning the first set, there is no chance that the odds on the player who lost the first set should be 1.40 in normal conditions. btc365 and their odds provider messed up big time here.

Later they apologized and returned my stake and voided everything on that match which were in live market.Quote from: thebloodmaster on September 18, 2022, 06:32:08 AMYou should post in their relevant thread to remind them to enable this setting.Do that. No one is going to do it for you. But I think since they are investigating your account and taking time, give the time. Let us know updated whenever you have any. We are following the topic.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on September 18, 2022, 06:32:08 AMsadly i cant contact them cuz i get this error User 'btc365partners' has not chosen to allow messages from newbies. Their forum representative can also be contacted over Skype. You can find the contact details on their profile. Just copy the entire line you see (live:.cid.6df5ea045e9281e7) and search for the person over Skype. It will work. Btc365partners hasn't been online on Bitcointalk since 30 August, so they aren't a regular here. Try to reach out over Skype, send them a message and a link to this thread, and see if that will work. If you don't get a response after a few days, let me know and I can send them a PM from my account.
